Name: Disfigure: Prologue
About the game: / Disfigure: Prologue is a short introduction to the full game Disfigure . In an arena shrouded by darkness, pay keen attention to your surroundings where monsters could be lurking. Switch between circle and cone vision: one allows you to see all around but not far, while the latter allows you to see far in one direction. Variety of Builds Choose from over 80 upgrades to create a unique build for each run. Become a pyromaniac, fire a storm of bullets, or even harness light to destroy your enemies! Prologue Content 5 unique enemies Horrifying boss fight Over 80 upgrades to choose from 6 unique weapons Quick restarts with 10 minute runs
